00024 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00025 // D3DXCreatePolygon: 
00026 // ------------------
00027 // Creates a mesh containing an n-sided polygon.  The polygon is centered
00028 // at the origin.
00029 //
00030 // Parameters:
00031 //
00032 //  pDevice     The D3D device with which the mesh is going to be used.
00033 //  Length      Length of each side.
00034 //  Sides       Number of sides the polygon has.  (Must be >= 3)
00035 //  ppMesh      The mesh object which will be created
00036 //  ppAdjacency Returns a buffer containing adjacency info.  Can be NULL.
00037 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00038 HRESULT WINAPI 
00039     D3DXCreatePolygon(
00040         LPDIRECT3DDEVICE9   pDevice,
00041         FLOAT               Length, 
00042         UINT                Sides, 
00043         LPD3DXMESH*         ppMesh,
00044         LPD3DXBUFFER*       ppAdjacency);
00045 
00046 
00047 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00048 // D3DXCreateBox: 
00049 // --------------
00050 // Creates a mesh containing an axis-aligned box.  The box is centered at
00051 // the origin.
00052 //
00053 // Parameters:
00054 //
00055 //  pDevice     The D3D device with which the mesh is going to be used.
00056 //  Width       Width of box (along X-axis)
00057 //  Height      Height of box (along Y-axis)
00058 //  Depth       Depth of box (along Z-axis)
00059 //  ppMesh      The mesh object which will be created
00060 //  ppAdjacency Returns a buffer containing adjacency info.  Can be NULL.
00061 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00062 HRESULT WINAPI 
00063     D3DXCreateBox(
00064         LPDIRECT3DDEVICE9   pDevice, 
00065         FLOAT               Width,
00066         FLOAT               Height,
00067         FLOAT               Depth,
00068         LPD3DXMESH*         ppMesh,
00069         LPD3DXBUFFER*       ppAdjacency);
00070 
00071 
00072 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00073 // D3DXCreateCylinder:
00074 // -------------------
00075 // Creates a mesh containing a cylinder.  The generated cylinder is
00076 // centered at the origin, and its axis is aligned with the Z-axis.
00077 //
00078 // Parameters:
00079 //
00080 //  pDevice     The D3D device with which the mesh is going to be used.
00081 //  Radius1     Radius at -Z end (should be >= 0.0f)
00082 //  Radius2     Radius at +Z end (should be >= 0.0f)
00083 //  Length      Length of cylinder (along Z-axis)
00084 //  Slices      Number of slices about the main axis
00085 //  Stacks      Number of stacks along the main axis
00086 //  ppMesh      The mesh object which will be created
00087 //  ppAdjacency Returns a buffer containing adjacency info.  Can be NULL.
00088 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00089 HRESULT WINAPI 
00090     D3DXCreateCylinder(
00091         LPDIRECT3DDEVICE9   pDevice,
00092         FLOAT               Radius1, 
00093         FLOAT               Radius2, 
00094         FLOAT               Length, 
00095         UINT                Slices, 
00096         UINT                Stacks,   
00097         LPD3DXMESH*         ppMesh,
00098         LPD3DXBUFFER*       ppAdjacency);
00099 
00100 
00101 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00102 // D3DXCreateSphere:
00103 // -----------------
00104 // Creates a mesh containing a sphere.  The sphere is centered at the
00105 // origin.
00106 //
00107 // Parameters:
00108 //
00109 //  pDevice     The D3D device with which the mesh is going to be used.
00110 //  Radius      Radius of the sphere (should be >= 0.0f)
00111 //  Slices      Number of slices about the main axis
00112 //  Stacks      Number of stacks along the main axis
00113 //  ppMesh      The mesh object which will be created
00114 //  ppAdjacency Returns a buffer containing adjacency info.  Can be NULL.
00115 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00116 HRESULT WINAPI
00117     D3DXCreateSphere(
00118         LPDIRECT3DDEVICE9  pDevice, 
00119         FLOAT              Radius, 
00120         UINT               Slices, 
00121         UINT               Stacks,
00122         LPD3DXMESH*        ppMesh,
00123         LPD3DXBUFFER*      ppAdjacency);
00124 
00125 
00126 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00127 // D3DXCreateTorus:
00128 // ----------------
00129 // Creates a mesh containing a torus.  The generated torus is centered at
00130 // the origin, and its axis is aligned with the Z-axis.
00131 //
00132 // Parameters: 
00133 //
00134 //  pDevice     The D3D device with which the mesh is going to be used.
00135 //  InnerRadius Inner radius of the torus (should be >= 0.0f)
00136 //  OuterRadius Outer radius of the torue (should be >= 0.0f)
00137 //  Sides       Number of sides in a cross-section (must be >= 3)
00138 //  Rings       Number of rings making up the torus (must be >= 3)
00139 //  ppMesh      The mesh object which will be created
00140 //  ppAdjacency Returns a buffer containing adjacency info.  Can be NULL.
00141 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00142 HRESULT WINAPI
00143     D3DXCreateTorus(
00144         LPDIRECT3DDEVICE9   pDevice,
00145         FLOAT               InnerRadius,
00146         FLOAT               OuterRadius, 
00147         UINT                Sides,
00148         UINT                Rings, 
00149         LPD3DXMESH*         ppMesh,
00150         LPD3DXBUFFER*       ppAdjacency);
00151 
00152 
00153 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00154 // D3DXCreateTeapot: 
00155 // -----------------
00156 // Creates a mesh containing a teapot.
00157 //
00158 // Parameters: 
00159 //
00160 //  pDevice     The D3D device with which the mesh is going to be used.
00161 //  ppMesh      The mesh object which will be created
00162 //  ppAdjacency Returns a buffer containing adjacency info.  Can be NULL.
00163 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00164 HRESULT WINAPI
00165     D3DXCreateTeapot(
00166         LPDIRECT3DDEVICE9   pDevice,
00167         LPD3DXMESH*         ppMesh,
00168         LPD3DXBUFFER*       ppAdjacency);

00170 
00171 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00172 // D3DXCreateText: 
00173 // --------------- 
00174 // Creates a mesh containing the specified text using the font associated
00175 // with the device context.
00176 //
00177 // Parameters:
00178 //
00179 //  pDevice       The D3D device with which the mesh is going to be used.
00180 //  hDC           Device context, with desired font selected
00181 //  pText         Text to generate
00182 //  Deviation     Maximum chordal deviation from true font outlines
00183 //  Extrusion     Amount to extrude text in -Z direction
00184 //  ppMesh        The mesh object which will be created
00185 //  pGlyphMetrics Address of buffer to receive glyph metric data (or NULL)
00186 //-------------------------------------------------------------------------
00187 HRESULT WINAPI
00188     D3DXCreateTextA(
00189         LPDIRECT3DDEVICE9   pDevice,
00190         HDC                 hDC,
00191         LPCSTR              pText,
00192         FLOAT               Deviation,
00193         FLOAT               Extrusion,
00194         LPD3DXMESH*         ppMesh,
00195         LPD3DXBUFFER*       ppAdjacency,
00196         LPGLYPHMETRICSFLOAT pGlyphMetrics);
00197 
00198 HRESULT WINAPI
00199     D3DXCreateTextW(
00200         LPDIRECT3DDEVICE9   pDevice,
00201         HDC                 hDC,
00202         LPCWSTR             pText,
00203         FLOAT               Deviation,
00204         FLOAT               Extrusion,
00205         LPD3DXMESH*         ppMesh,
00206         LPD3DXBUFFER*       ppAdjacency,
00207         LPGLYPHMETRICSFLOAT pGlyphMetrics);
00208 
00209 #ifdef UNICODE
00210 #define D3DXCreateText D3DXCreateTextW
00211 #else
00212 #define D3DXCreateText D3DXCreateTextA
00213 #endif
